backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing video sessions with segment creation, status updates, and public querying via in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking product requirements to frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files and modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer and OKLCH theme variables defining light/dark color systems and global style tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx with mobile-friendly metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React flow for multi-step video generation, handling Grok config, clip generation, composition, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing themed header, footer, and background visuals for all screens.
Fixed bottom bar rendering a single primary action button with loading and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/ClipSegmentsList: Renders a list of generated video segments with status indicators, previews, errors, and retry/back actions. Handles generation progress and optional display of Grok live view.
frontend/src/components/ClipVideoPreview: Displays a video clip preview with loading, error, and retry handling, validating the clip URL before rendering. Manages hidden video loading to detect metadata or errors.
frontend/src/components/ComposedVideoPre: Handles composing multiple clip videos into one file, showing progress, errors, and download options. Supports retrying composition and fallback behaviors when composition isn't supported.
frontend/src/components/ErrorNotice.tsx: Shows a destructive alert with an error message and optional retry or start‑over buttons. Used for general failure states.
frontend/src/components/GrokLiveView.tsx: Embeds the Grok interface in an iframe with fallback messaging if blocked by browser restrictions. Includes loading state and option to open Grok in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/MobileStepper.ts: Displays a mobile-friendly stepper UI showing progress through prompt, clips, compose, and download stages. Highlights current, completed, and upcoming steps.
frontend/src/components/PromptComposer.t: Provides UI for crafting the generation prompt, clip count, durations, and reference images, with validation and Grok runtime configuration management. Supports editing and saving endpoint/API key settings.
frontend/src/components/ReferenceImageUp: Image upload component that validates files, manages previews, enforces limits, and lets users add or remove reference images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and restoring identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveGenerationProg: Hook that computes live progress and status labels for video clip generation based on segment states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query hooks for fetching a session or user sessions from the backend, with polling and identity-aware enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Hook for toggling light/dark theme and persisting it in localStorage while updating document classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoProvider.ts: Hook that exposes the current video provider and tracks whether Grok is properly configured, updating on config changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSession.ts: Hook that manages video generation sessions, orchestrating segment prompts, clip generation, statuses, and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark color themes, layout variables, and mobile-friendly global styles.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Provides a robust video downloading utility supporting Blob and remote URLs with extension inference and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/duration.ts: Contains duration calculation, validation, suggestions, and auto-splitting utilities for video clip timing.
frontend/src/lib/fileEncoding.ts: Encodes image files to base64 for API use and handles batch encoding with detailed error reporting.
frontend/src/lib/grokEndpoint.ts: Validates and normalizes Grok API endpoints, including canonical xAI endpoint handling and format checks.
frontend/src/lib/grokRuntimeConfig.ts: Manages Grok API runtime config in localStorage with validation, change notifications, and legacy endpoint detection.
frontend/src/lib/referenceImages.ts: Defines rules and helpers for validating, formatting, and generating preview URLs for reference image uploads.
frontend/src/lib/videoCompose.ts: Implements basic multi‑clip composition flow with progress callbacks, capability checks, and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Validates video URLs via HEAD requests or video element loading and checks ClipData structure integrity.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/providers/grokProvider.ts: Handles Grok provider config resolution, validates endpoints, encodes reference images, and sends video-generation requests to the Grok API.
frontend/src/providers/videoProvider.ts: Wraps Grok provider functions as the sole video provider, exposing segment derivation and clip generation APIs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme colors, typography, container settings, and custom utilities.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for the Grok-powered video generator.
